Class OrderControl

java.lang.Object
OrderControl
public class OrderControl extends Object
The order controller for the customer's orders.
Since:
2021-11-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
Benedict Ee

  • Constructor Details

    • OrderControl

      public OrderControl​(String time)
      Creates the order controller
      Parameters:
      time - The date and time when the order list was created.

  • Method Details

    • AddItem

      public void AddItem​(int item_id, int quantity)
      Adds an item into the order list.
      Parameters:
      item_id - The id number of the food item to be added.
      quantity - The number of food items to be added.

    • RemoveItem

      public void RemoveItem​(int index, int quantity)
      Removes an item from the order list.
      Parameters:
      index - The index number of the food item in the order list to be removed.
      quantity - The number of food items to be removed.

    • PrintItem

      public String PrintItem​(int index)
      Gets the name of the food in the order list based on the index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index number of the food item in the order list.
      Returns:
      The name of the food item.

    • CheckQuantity

      public int CheckQuantity​(int index)
      Gets the quantity of the food in the order list based on the index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index number of the food item in the order list.
      Returns:
      The number of food items in the node.

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Gets the size of the order list.
      Returns:
      The size of the order list.

    • DisplayOrder

      public void DisplayOrder()
      Prints the order list.

    • PrintInvoice

      public void PrintInvoice​(boolean member, int number_of_pax, String staff_name, int reserved_id)
      Prints the invoice upon customer check_out and writes to "sales.txt" file to save a record of sales and items sold.
      Parameters:
      member - If customer is a member, set to true. Else, set to false.
      number_of_pax - The number of customers served in this reservation.
      staff_name - The staff's name who created the customer's order.
      reserved_id - The reservation ID of the customer with this order.
